House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04553
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING ARTICLE 70 OF ACT NO. 3815, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE REVISED PENAL CODE
SHORT TITLE : Amending Article 70 Of Act No. 3815, As Amended, Otherwise Known As The Revised Penal Code
ABSTRACT : Proposes to amend R.A.No.3815, as amended by R.A.No.10592 by removing the forty (40)-year maximum period of imprisonment as regards to successive service of sentences in order to prevent the blatant traversty of the justice system and to ensue that justice is served to the victims and their relatives
